div.p: Through my most humble letter I write, do reverence, and greet the honourable footsteps of my God-protected lord (?). Since the God-protected vice-dominus has written in regard to the […] and further seven workers to Memphis, and the four were sent […] and concerning one donkey, so that I will send to Babylon together with the workers […] the pistikos ordered them to release all the donkeys and […] because I have no workers for transporting. Then, I will ask […] workers to these, so that they can transport the … […] be sent one guard to me (?) from Kainou, the chorion (?) […] ... […] so you can buy […]
